statements: SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT signature_id, land_cover_type, collection_date FROM spectral_signatures WHERE wavelength_range LIKE '%NIR%';
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures ORDER BY collection_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest' AND collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT signature_id, spectral_values FROM spectral_signatures WHERE last_updated IS NOT NULL ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT land_cover_type, COUNT(*) AS num_signatures FROM spectral_signatures GROUP BY land_cover_type HAVING num_signatures > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT wavelength_range FROM spectral_signatures WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures ORDER BY collection_date DESC, signature_id;
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures;
SELECT land_cover_type, spectral_band_1, spectral_band_2 FROM spectral_signatures WHERE spectral_band_3 > 0.5;
SELECT image_url, analysis_date FROM remote_sensing_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT land_cover_type FROM spectral_signatures;
SELECT land_cover_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM remote_sensing_analysis GROUP BY land_cover_type;
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures WHERE land_cover_type = 'forest';
SELECT spectral_band_1, spectral_band_2, spectral_band_3 FROM spectral_signatures WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY classification_result DESC;
SELECT id, land_cover_type FROM spectral_signatures ORDER BY spectral_band_1 ASC, spectral_band_2 DESC;
SELECT MAX(spectral_band_1) AS max_band_1, AVG(spectral_band_2) AS avg_band_2 FROM spectral_signatures WHERE land_cover_type = 'field';
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures;
SELECT signature_id, land_cover_type FROM spectral_signatures WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_types ORDER BY land_cover_name DESC;
SELECT signature_id, land_cover_type, spectral_values FROM spectral_signatures WHERE land_cover_type = 'forest';
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_data WHERE capture_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT land_cover_name, spectral_values->'band1' AS band1_value FROM spectral_signatures JOIN land_cover_types ON spectral_signatures.land_cover_type = land_cover_types.type_id;
SELECT AVG(spectral_values->>'band2') AS avg_band2_value, COUNT(*) AS total_signatures FROM spectral_signatures;
SELECT DISTINCT land_cover_name FROM land_cover_types ORDER BY land_cover_name;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_data WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT id, land_cover_type, spectral_wave_length_range, spectral_intensity FROM spectral_signatures_land_cover_types;
SELECT land_cover_type, spectral_intensity, spectral_wave_length_range, id FROM spectral_signatures_land_cover_types;
SELECT spectral_intensity, land_cover_type FROM spectral_signatures_land_cover_types;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_categories;
SELECT id, data_source_name, provider, coverage_area FROM data_sources;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_categories WHERE id = 1;
SELECT land_cover_category, description FROM land_cover_categories ORDER BY land_cover_category DESC;
SELECT spectral_wave_length_range, spectral_intensity FROM spectral_signatures_land_cover_types WHERE spectral_intensity > 0.5;

SELECT land_cover_type, attribute_name, attribute_value FROM land_cover_attributes JOIN spectral_signatures_land_cover_types ON land_cover_attributes.land_cover_type_id = spectral_signatures_land_cover_types.id WHERE spectral_signatures_land_cover_types.spectral_intensity < 0.3;
SELECT data_source_name, provider, coverage_area FROM data_sources ORDER BY data_source_name;
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures
SELECT land_cover_type, spectral_band_1, spectral_band_3 FROM spectral_signatures ORDER BY spectral_band_1 DESC
SELECT result_id, analysis_result FROM spectral_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT cover_type_name FROM land_cover_types WHERE cover_type_id = 3
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'johnsmith'
SELECT * FROM spectral_signatures ORDER BY spectral_band_1 DESC, spectral_band_2 ASC
SELECT signature_id, spectral_band_1, spectral_band_2 FROM spectral_signatures WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest' AND spectral_band_3 > 0.5
SELECT * FROM spectral_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC

SELECT cover_type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_signatures FROM land_cover_types INNER JOIN spectral_signatures ON land_cover_types.cover_type_id = spectral_signatures.signature_id GROUP BY cover_type_name ORDER BY total_signatures DESC

SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(ar.result_id) AS total_results FROM user_accounts u LEFT JOIN spectral_analysis_results ar ON u.user_id = ar.result_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_results DESC
